name: 123 Domino Full Version
description:
123 Domino, colored dominos for kids.
Thanks to the colors, your kids will be able to play a logical game of 3 side-dominos, from 2 years old.

28 puzzles are included in a progressive challenge.

This game is part of our educational game collection "Learning is fun". More infos on http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/ or http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/ipad.html
